review: Dr Vineeth Arora is highly experienced physician and I have been getting treatment since 2013. During Covid pandemic, Dr Arora timely treatment over Whatsapp helped me lot and I able to get cured only because of his out of the box treatment. A soft spoken, very humble and treatment with human touch are few of his qualities. He is best doctor in the country. Dr Narender Nagarwal

Dr. Vineet can be called our family doctor now. Anybody that gets sick goes to him. My father was admitted in Max hospital, he had fever and was very week and thanks to Dr. Vineet and the care he got there , he recovered well and got energetic within 6 days. Even I got fever which was not coming down beside medicine and then my husband insisted to visit Dr.Vineet and just in 1 Day dose I got well and got back in action. He is amazing.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I do not recommend this doctor to anyone. Need to wait Atleast 2-3 hours.
One of my relative went there for his stomach pain and continue vomiting with carrying his blood test and ultrasound reports, in which clearly mentioned that he has 6mm stone and  15 mm cyst above on left kidney.

He gave him medicine for 5 days and asked for to do repeat the test and come again.
After 5 days we again went to his clinic with new report.
he said no problem all report are okay **** ** ******** ********** **** ***** *** ******* ** ** ********Even after taking 5 days of medicine no changes.
When i asked him to explain the Report anything is serious or not?

Doctor shouted on me and said I can't explain you every meaning of report and if you want to know more about it go and do costly tests and do other investigations.

We were amazed with that behaviour 
If we are patients and we are paying Rs.800 for 5 min consultation after waiting for 2-3 hours.
We have right to know about our report our disease.
Sorry but i really disappointed with his behaviour and they way he shouted on me after asking report results.

My mama was admitted in max, shalimar bagh and he was doing fine when they admitted him as he had bp issues and he wasn't able to pass urine which did not seem such an issue to us. We just thought he will be fine as he could walk and talk but weakness was there. He was talking on the day he was admitted that is 12th sep and on 13sep the next day but on 14th at 4ish morning, the entire story was changed. Dr. Arora was looking on to him with his mannerless staff. They all did not work on him well and due to their negligence we lost him in just two days. A happy and playful man had gone in just two days *** ** **** ******** ******** ** * ***** *** ********

***** ****** **** **** He made a fyn pesron to death. He is just their to earn money nothing else. Never attended patient in 2 days while in ward. Never scene such an irresponsible doctor in my lyf. ********* He told us that patient was affected from chiken gunya but i consulted other 5 hospitals and all of them told us patient is not suffering from chicken gunya. Made patient to death who was completely fit and fine while he went to hospital.
The way he discuss with the patients is such a relief for patients. Friendly nature helps heal the disease sooner. And also prescribes good
Doctor is not ready to listen the full problem of patient. **** **** **** ****** ** write medicine with out listening the full details of problems of patient. Not good experience.

context: Diabetes Management,Blood Pressure Changes,Colds,Pain in Left part of Chest,
review: I am visiting this place since 15 years and satisfied with the treatment. He is like a go to person for us in every health issue. Really happy.
He is a nice doctor *** *** ********** ********* ****** ****** A nice and Experienced doctor he is.
